entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Drizzle, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 10:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Drizzle
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 20 overnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Fog patches. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
